p: Leaves of A. vera and A. arborescens were collected from the existing Collection of Aloe genus specimen of Parque Botânico da Tapada da Ajuda (member of the Botanic Gardens Conservation International – BGCI), Instituto Superior de Agronomia, University of Lisbon (ISA/UL), Portugal. The species were kindly identified by Dr. Nuno Costa, Botanist, and are still alive in Parque Botânico da Tapada da Ajuda, ISA/UL, Portugal. All selected individuals had several years of existence and were not in the flowering season. Leaf samples were collected from at least three different plants.
